deckInfo.name: Chinese Learning - My Little Apple v1::Level 2 - Complete Lines::Listening
deckInfo.description: Complete lyric lines and sentences from 'My Little Apple' song

lyricLines.description: The opening agricultural metaphor about love growing like fruit

cards.back:
我种下一颗种子

(wǒ zhǒngxià yīkē zhǒngzi)

I planted a seed

Complete opening line using Level 1 concepts: 我 + 种下 + 一颗 + 种子
cards.translation: I planted a seed

cards.back:
终于长出了果实

(zhōngyú zhǎngchū le guǒshí)

finally bore fruit

Result of planting: 终于 + 长出 + 了 + 果实
cards.translation: finally bore fruit

cards.back:
今天是个伟大日子

(jīntiān shì gè wěidà rìzi)

Today is a great day

Celebrating the result: 今天 + 是 + 个 + 伟大 + 日子
cards.translation: Today is a great day

lyricLines.description: Grand romantic gestures involving celestial objects

cards.back:
摘下星星送给你

(zhāixià xīngxīng sòng gěi nǐ)

I give the stars to you

Romantic promise: 摘下 + 星星 + 送给 + 你
cards.translation: I give the stars to you

cards.back:
拽下月亮送给你

(zhuāixià yuèliàng sòng gěi nǐ)

I give the moon to you

Romantic promise: 拽下 + 月亮 + 送给 + 你
cards.translation: I give the moon to you

cards.back:
让太阳

(ràng tàiyáng)

Let the sun

Phrase segment: Part of '让太阳每天为你升起'
cards.translation: Let the sun

cards.back:
每天

(měitiān)

Everyday

Phrase segment: Part of '让太阳每天为你升起'
cards.translation: Everyday

cards.back:
为你升起

(wéi nǐ shēngqǐ)

Rise for you

Phrase segment: Part of '让太阳每天为你升起'
cards.translation: Rise for you

cards.back:
让太阳每天为你升起

(ràng tàiyáng měitiān wéi nǐ shēngqǐ)

Raise the sun everyday for you

Ultimate promise: 让 + 太阳 + 每天 + 为 + 你 + 升起
cards.translation: Raise the sun everyday for you

lyricLines.description: The bridge about becoming a candle and giving everything

cards.back:
变成蜡烛燃烧自己

(biànchéng làzhú ránshāo zìjǐ)

I'll turn into a candle and let myself burn

Self-sacrifice metaphor: 变成 + 蜡烛 + 燃烧 + 自己
cards.translation: I'll turn into a candle and let myself burn

cards.back:
只为照亮你

(zhǐ wéi zhàoliàng nǐ)

just to shine a light on you

Purpose of sacrifice: 只为 + 照亮 + 你
cards.translation: just to shine a light on you

cards.back:
把我一切都献给你

(bǎ wǒ yīqiè dōu xiàn gěi nǐ)

I'll give everything I have to you

Total giving: 把 + 我 + 一切 + 都 + 献给 + 你
cards.translation: I'll give everything I have to you

cards.back:
只要你欢喜

(zhǐyào nǐ huānxǐ)

as long as you're happy

Condition for sacrifice: 只要 + 你 + 欢喜
cards.translation: as long as you're happy

lyricLines.description: Lines about life's meaning and eternal love

cards.back:
你让我

(nǐ ràng wǒ)

You make me

Phrase segment: Part of '你让我每个明天都变得有意义'
cards.translation: You make me

cards.back:
每个明天

(měi ge míngtiān)

every tomorrow

Phrase segment: Part of '你让我每个明天都变得有意义'
cards.translation: every tomorrow

cards.back:
都变得有意义

(dōu biànde yǒu yìyì)

all become meaningful

Phrase segment: Part of '你让我每个明天都变得有意义'
cards.translation: all become meaningful

cards.back:
生命虽短爱你永远

(shēngmìng suī duǎn ài nǐ yǒngyuǎn)

Though life is short, I'll love you forever

Eternal promise: 生命 + 虽 + 短 + 爱 + 你 + 永远
cards.translation: Though life is short, I'll love you forever

cards.back:
不离不弃

(bù lí bù qì)

never abandoning you

Loyalty promise: 不 + 离 + 不 + 弃
cards.translation: never abandoning you

lyricLines.description: The iconic chorus comparing the beloved to a little apple

cards.back:
你是我的小呀小苹果儿

(nǐ shì wǒ de xiǎo ya xiǎo píngguǒr)

You are my little apple

Main metaphor: 你 + 是 + 我的 + 小呀小 + 苹果儿
cards.chineseText: 你是我的小呀小苹果儿
cards.translation: You are my little apple

cards.back:
怎么爱你都不嫌多

(zěnme ài nǐ dōu bù xiánduō)

I can never love you too much

Unlimited love: 怎么 + 爱 + 你 + 都 + 不嫌多
cards.translation: I can never love you too much

cards.back:
红红的小脸儿温暖我的心窝

(hóng hóng de xiǎoliǎnr wēnnuǎn wǒ de xīnwō)

Your red face warms my heart

Physical warmth: 红红的 + 小脸儿 + 温暖 + 我的 + 心窝
cards.chineseText: 红红的小脸儿温暖我的心窝
cards.translation: Your red face warms my heart

cards.back:
点亮我生命的火 火火火火

(diǎnliàng wǒ shēngmìng de huǒ huǒ huǒ huǒ huǒ)

lighting the fire, fire, fire, fire, fire in my life

Life ignition: 点亮 + 我 + 生命 + 的 + 火 火火火火
cards.chineseText: 点亮我生命的火 火火火火
cards.translation: lighting the fire, fire, fire, fire, fire in my life

cards.back:
你是我的

(nǐ shì wǒ de)

You are my

Phrase segment: Part of '你是我的小呀小苹果儿'
cards.translation: You are my

cards.back:
小呀小苹果儿

(xiǎo ya xiǎo píngguǒr)

Little apple

Phrase segment: Part of '你是我的小呀小苹果儿'
cards.translation: Little apple

lyricLines.description: Beautiful nature metaphors from the chorus

cards.back:
就像天边最美的云朵

(jiùxiàng tiānbiān zuì měi de yúnduǒ)

like the most beautiful cloud in the sky

Beauty comparison: 就像 + 天边 + 最美的 + 云朵
cards.translation: like the most beautiful cloud in the sky

cards.back:
春天又来到了花开满山坡

(chūntiān yòu láidào le huā kāimǎnshānpō)

Spring arrives again, and flowers bloom all over the mountainside

Spring renewal: 春天 + 又 + 来到了 + 花开满山坡
cards.chineseText: 春天又来到了花开满山坡
cards.translation: Spring arrives again, and flowers bloom all over the mountainside

cards.back:
种下希望就会收获

(zhǒngxià xīwàng jiù huì shōuhuò)

I reap the hopes that I sowed

Hope harvest: 种下 + 希望 + 就会 + 收获
cards.translation: I reap the hopes that I sowed

lyricLines.description: Verse about accepting everything and freshness of love

cards.back:
从不觉得你讨厌

(cóng bù juéde nǐ tǎoyàn)

I've never disliked you

Never negative: 从不 + 觉得 + 你 + 讨厌
cards.translation: I've never disliked you

cards.back:
你的一切都喜欢

(nǐ de yīqiè dōu xǐhuān)

I like everything about you

Total acceptance: 你的 + 一切 + 都 + 喜欢
cards.translation: I like everything about you

cards.back:
有你的每天都新鲜

(yǒu nǐ de měitiān dōu xīnxiān)

With you, everyday is always fresh

Daily freshness: 有你的 + 每天 + 都 + 新鲜
cards.translation: With you, everyday is always fresh

lyricLines.description: Contrasting light and darkness with love

cards.back:
有你阳光更灿烂

(yǒu nǐ yángguāng gèng cànlàn)

With you, the sun shines brighter

Enhanced brightness: 有你 + 阳光 + 更 + 灿烂
cards.translation: With you, the sun shines brighter

cards.back:
有你黑夜不黑暗

(yǒu nǐ hēiyè bù hēi'àn)

with you, the nights are not dark

Darkness negated: 有你 + 黑夜 + 不 + 黑暗
cards.translation: with you, the nights are not dark

cards.back:
你是白云我是蓝天

(nǐ shì báiyún wǒ shì lántiān)

You are the white clouds, and I am the blue sky

Sky metaphor: 你是 + 白云 + 我是 + 蓝天
cards.translation: You are the white clouds, and I am the blue sky

lyricLines.description: Bridge about experiencing all four seasons together

cards.back:
春天

(chūntiān)

In the spring

Phrase segment: Part of '春天和你漫步在盛开的花丛间'
cards.translation: In the spring

cards.back:
和你漫步

(hé nǐ mànbù)

I stroll with you

Phrase segment: Part of '春天和你漫步在盛开的花丛间'
cards.translation: I stroll with you

cards.back:
在盛开的花丛间

(zài shèngkāi de huācóng jiān)

through the flowers

Phrase segment: Part of '春天和你漫步在盛开的花丛间'
cards.translation: through the flowers

cards.back:
春天和你漫步在盛开的花丛间

(chūntiān hé nǐ mànbù zài shèngkāi de huācóng jiān)

In the spring, I stroll with you through the flowers

Complete bridge line: 春天 + 和你 + 漫步 + 在 + 盛开的 + 花丛间
cards.chineseText: 春天和你漫步在盛开的花丛间
cards.translation: In the spring, I stroll with you through the flowers

cards.back:
夏天夜晚陪你一起看星星眨眼

(xiàtiān yèwǎn péi nǐ yīqǐ kàn xīngxīng zhǎyǎn)

On summer nights, I watch the stars twinkle with you

Summer together: 夏天 + 夜晚 + 陪你 + 一起 + 看 + 星星 + 眨眼
cards.chineseText: 夏天夜晚陪你一起看星星眨眼
cards.translation: On summer nights, I watch the stars twinkle with you

cards.back:
秋天黄昏与你徜徉在金色麦田

(qiūtiān huánghūn yǔ nǐ chángyáng zài jīnsè màitián)

In the autumn dusk, we wander through golden fields

Autumn together: 秋天 + 黄昏 + 与你 + 徜徉 + 在 + 金色 + 麦田
cards.chineseText: 秋天黄昏与你徜徉在金色麦田
cards.translation: In the autumn dusk, we wander through golden fields

cards.back:
冬天雪花飞舞有你更加温暖

(dōngtiān xuěhuā fēiwǔ yǒu nǐ gèngjiā wēnnuǎn)

When snowflakes fall in the winter, you keep me warm

Winter together: 冬天 + 雪花 + 飞舞 + 有你 + 更加 + 温暖
cards.chineseText: 冬天雪花飞舞有你更加温暖
cards.translation: When snowflakes fall in the winter, you keep me warm
